MR funnel plot

mr_funnel_plot2.Rd

Adaptation from TwoSampleMR::mr_funnel_plot()

Usage

mr_funnel_plot2(singlesnp_results)

Arguments

singlesnp_results

Results based on single variants.

Value

A graphic object.

See also

dlply,mutate ggplot,aes,geom_point,ggtheme,geom_abline,scale_manual,labs,theme theme_cowplot
